text: Ta chuangzaole xuduo yuanpu, qizhong you mansheng de he zhili de guomu, yu guoshi ge bie di hai zao he bai gu, yu xing tong wei yi de zi dun he shiliu. Dang jieguo de shihou, nimen keyi cai shi qi guoshi; zai shouhuo de rizi, nimen dang shishe qizhong de yibufen, dan buyao guofen. Zhenzhu dique bu xi'ai guofen de ren
